entity.description: This class is part of Middlegen airlines, and it is a CMP EJB accessing the language_code table.

query.ejb-ql: SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(o) FROM LanguageCode o WHERE o.language = ?1
SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(o) FROM LanguageCode o WHERE o.name = ?1

cmp-field.description: A getter without a corresponding setter.

entity.description: This class is part of Middlegen airlines, and it is a CMP EJB accessing the city table.

query.ejb-ql: SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(o) FROM City o WHERE o.name = ?1

entity.description: This bean demonstrates all possible data types.

entity.description: This class is part of Middlegen airlines, and it is a CMP EJB accessing the country table.

query.ejb-ql: SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(o) FROM Country o WHERE o.country = ?1
SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(o) FROM Country o WHERE o.name = ?1
SELECT a.street FROM Address AS a WHERE a.street = 'Cinnamon Street'

entity.description: This class is part of Middlegen airlines, and it is a CMP EJB accessing the language table.

query.ejb-ql: SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(o) FROM Language o WHERE o.languageCode = ?1
SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT(o) FROM Language o WHERE o.name = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(f) FROM file AS f
SELECT OBJECT(f) FROM file AS f
SELECT OBJECT(f) FROM file AS f
SELECT OBJECT(f) FROM file AS f

message-driven.description: A message-driven bean based on a Queue.
